scripts.prebuild: (tsc -p src/server || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p src/client || echo "continue w/error")
scripts.x-test: tsc || echo "continue with errors" && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks tests\tests\*.js
scripts.test: (npm run build || echo "continue with errors") && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks tests/tests/*.js
scripts.clink: npm prune && npm i && npm run build && npm link consistencias && npm link datos-ext && npm run build
scripts.git-commit: git add package.json && (git commit -m "upgrading stack dependencies" || true)
scripts.push-publish: npm version patch && ncu -u && npm run git-commit && npm publish && git push
